Control Name: 3.10.8 You are aware of the appropriate metrics to monitor for performance tests under standard load.
Control Statement: A true performance test measures how the application performs under a standard load. It is critical to understand how your application operates--including CPU utilization and memory consumption--under a standard load. First, this will help you plan accordingly as you anticipate future user growth. Second, this gives you a baseline for performance regression testing.
